backend/main.mo: Actor defining types and mixins for storage, authorization, and domain models like schools, staff, payments, packing, and training visits.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend pages, hooks, and components involved in routing, data handling, and UI features.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining light and dark theme design tokens using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Initializes React Query, sets up the router, and wraps the app in theme and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/demo/DemoDataUna: Alert component showing a demo-mode message when demo data is missing.
frontend/src/components/demo/DemoPreview: Demo-mode banner with a role switcher that updates session state and reroutes accordingly.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Top-level layout handling identity/demo session, navigation, header UI, and logout logic.
frontend/src/components/layout/RoleNav.t: Role‑based navigation sidebar rendering different menu items per staff role with active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/schools/SchoolSe: Search panel listing schools with filtering and action links based on view mode.
frontend/src/demo/demoDataStore.ts: LocalStorage-backed demo data store for schools, outstanding amounts, and packing info with conversion helpers.
frontend/src/demo/demoGuards.ts: Provides helpers to disable mutations and show messages when demo mode is active.
frontend/src/demo/demoProfile.ts: Generates synthetic user profiles for each staff role during demo mode.
frontend/src/demo/demoRoutes.ts: Maps staff roles to their corresponding dashboard routes in demo mode.
frontend/src/demo/demoSession.ts: Handles demo session state, credentials, persistence, and role access in localStorage.
frontend/src/demo/useDemoPreview.ts: Hook for reading and updating demo-mode session state and role selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor using Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, schools, and demo fallbacks, integrating with the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/academic/AcademicQuer: Lists academic queries with filtering and allows responding via a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/accounts/SchoolPaymen: Manages school payments, supporting creation, editing, proof uploads, and handling demo mode restrictions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AuditLogPage.ts: Displays and filters audit logs with search and type filtering, including demo mode handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/OutstandingAmou: Allows admins to search schools and update each school's outstanding amount.
frontend/src/pages/admin/StaffManagement: Provides UI to list, create, edit, and repair staff profiles with form dialogs and mutation handling. Includes demo-mode guards and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AcademicDa: Displays counts of open and resolved academic queries with summary cards and a link to view all queries.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AccountsDa: Shows total schools and provides a school search panel for accounts-related operations.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard summarizing total schools, staff, and audit logs, plus recent activity and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/MarketingD: Marketing dashboard showing total schools and offering school registration and search tools.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PackingDas: Packing dashboard showing school count and quick actions to search and manage packing tasks.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/TrainingDa: Training dashboard summarizing total schools and open academic queries, with a school search panel.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements login UI with Internet Identity and demo mode, handling authentication flow and redirects.
frontend/src/pages/marketing/SchoolCreat: Form page for creating a new school, submitting details via mutation and redirecting based on user role.
frontend/src/pages/packing/packingOption: Defines available packing class and theme option constants for the UI.
frontend/src/pages/packing/PackingSchool: Displays a searchable list of schools for packing management and navigates to each school’s packing page.
frontend/src/pages/packing/SchoolPacking: Manages packing status and counts for a selected school with class/theme filters and update actions.
frontend/src/pages/schools/SchoolDetails: Shows school details with editable fields and displays outstanding financial information.
frontend/src/pages/training/SchoolTraini: Lists and creates training visit logs for a specific school, including file upload for proof.
frontend/src/pages/training/TrainingQuer: Displays all academic queries raised by the user, with statuses and responses.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines application routing, authentication handling, and dashboard redirects based on user roles.
frontend/src/utils/getErrorMessage.ts: Provides a safe extractor for user-facing error messages, with special handling for BigInt serialization errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL and sessionStorage parameters and persisting them across navigation, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the app’s architecture, RBAC rules, known issues, and existing feature records for internal planning.
